titleStmt.title: An exercitation on the historical relation, Matth. 15, 1--9, Mark 7, 1--13, concerning eating with unwashen hands by way of appendix or supplement to the discourse concerning indifferencies ...
titleStmt.author: Alsop, Vincent, 1629 or 30-1703.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Vincent Alsop. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Princeton Theological Seminary Library.
